description: Creamy pasta bake with tender chicken, mixed vegetables, and a golden cheese topping. Kid-friendly and packed with hidden nutrition.
side: Roasted broccoli with parmesan sprinkle and garlic bread

meal: Breakfast for Dinner: Pancake & Egg Extravaganza
description: Fluffy buttermilk pancakes with customizable toppings, scrambled eggs, and crispy bacon. Interactive meal where kids can design their own plates.
side: Fresh fruit salad and hash browns

description: Homemade cheeseburgers with crispy tater tots on the side, perfect for a family-friendly meal!
Teriyaki-glazed ground chicken served with crisp lettuce leaves, rice, and an array of fun toppings like crispy wontons and green onions.
Crispy coconut-crusted shrimp in soft tortillas with a mild mango salsa. Colorful, crunchy, and fun to assemble.
Individual pizza crusts with various toppings. Kids can create their own masterpiece with pre-chopped ingredients.
Tender slow-cooked beef roast with a sweet and tangy honey mustard glaze. Served with roasted seasonal vegetables.
side: Creamy mashed potatoes and roasted carrots
